The only way to do this with Quest is to do as I do.

I set up a tumblr site (you can use your own site/blog/whatever) then I hosted my game here (the only place you can host Quest games) then linked directly to the game.

If you launch your game and use the URL to make the link on your website (rather than the link to its page on Quest), clicking that link will launch the game in the browser and give the appearance it's being launched from your own website.

Of course the URL will expose it as a Quest game, but I don't think the majority of people would notice that. As for offering a download, I don't know if you can get the direct link for that too, so that the download dialogue pops up in your site, but I just link back to the Quest page.

You can see mine in action here: http://takekey.tumblr.com/
